caption: We love 💘 it outdoor ambiance x 10 plus awesome music, you must go there i can't wait to get back. the best place in waikiki for some cocktails and pupus

Do not recommend this place. Service is terrible. It takes forever to have your food and even your drinks. The server just forgot to put my burger in to the order. Don't waist your vacation time here.
Best Sunday Brunch on the Island!!! KYLIE was soo awesome. We will definitely be coming back!
Disgusting food!!!🤢🤮Never recommend! Poor menu, and even these few dishes they have they cannot cook normally!!

After getting recommendations from several locals about the sunset scene at this poolside bar nested up on the 5th floor of the Alohilani in Waikiki, we decided to give it a try. Not only was this clearly a locals favorite hangout (with overstuffed furniture around mini fire pits), the food and drinks were amazing. Our bartender was Chad and he was working his tail off! Every time we were going to ask for something, chad was already on his way to our table with whatever we were going to ask for on his tray and a big smile -- like he knows just how to make sure each person really enjoys their vacation. We can't wait to go back during our next visit to paradise.
